channel.title: What could the RSPS community use?
channel.description: I've got some free time and nothing to do. So... Is there anything web-related that you guys think the RSPS community could use? If it involves integration with the server, I can try to pull it off, but no promises. I had the idea of a price guide/checker that is user submitted, but that's basic and no fun. Any ideas would be cool. Thanks!

item.title: What could the RSPS community use?
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

well i could use some help. i need someone to run a python script with certin pramaiters when you click a button on the same webserver. the site is pure php.

I have heard its possible

Read full topic

item.title: What could the RSPS community use?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:4, topic:547796”]An rsps->forum friendslist with pm and status functionality would be sweet, could further be expanded to allow attachments like the mailbox in WoW.

Hell it’d even be fun to even set up commands in-game to browse a text-based version of the forum.[/quote]
Thanks for the idea

I might try to incorporate that into my project.
Not so much the in-game but good job thinking outside the box

Read full topic
item.source: What could the RSPS community use?

item.title: What could the RSPS community use?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

An rsps->forum friendslist with pm and status functionality would be sweet, could further be expanded to allow attachments like the mailbox in WoW.

Hell it’d even be fun to even set up commands in-game to browse a text-based version of the forum.

item.title: What could the RSPS community use?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

I took a template and am integrating it with smf atm , I’m having a difficult time with the design aspect if you wanna help :3

Im not affiliated with the name of the rsps or any rsps that is being shown in this picture, in fact I think the one being advertised is no longer up.

I also have some functionality that I’m adding to the home page you can help with if you’d like since I think you’re more of a programmer rather than a designer.

Read full topic
